words.id: Maha Berkah/Suci||(Allah) yang||telah menurunkan||Al Furqan||atas||hamba-Nya||agar dia menjadi||bagi seluruh alam||pemberi peringatan
words.en: Blessed is He||Who||sent down||the Criterion||upon||His slave||that he may be||to the worlds||a warner

translations.text: Tabaarakal lazee nazzalal Furqaana 'alaa abdihee li-yakoona lil'aalameena nazeera

words.id: yang||bagi/kepunyaan-Nya||kerajaan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dan tidak||Dia mengambil||anak||dan tidak||adalah||bagiNya||sekutu||dalam||kerajaan/kekuasaan||dan Dia menciptakan||segala/tiap-tiap||sesuatu||maka Dia menentukannya||ketentuan/kadar/ukuran
words.en: The One Who||to Him (belongs)||(the) dominion||(of) the heavens||and the earth||and not||He has taken||a son||and not||He has||for Him||a partner||in||the dominion||and He (has) created||every||thing||and determined it||(with) determination

translations.text: Allazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati walardi Wa-lam yattakhiz waladanw Wa-lam yakul lahoo shareekun fil mulki Wa-khalaqa kulla shai'in faqaddarahoo taqdeeraa

words.id: dan mereka mengambil||dari||selain-Nya||tuhan-tuhan||tidak||mereka menciptakan||sesuatu apapun||dan mereka||mereka diciptakan||dan tidak||kuasa/mampu||bagi diri mereka sendiri||kemudaratan||dan tidak||kemanfaatan||dan tidak||mereka kuasa/tidak mampu||kematian||dan tidak||kehidupan||dan tidak||kebangkitan
words.en: Yet they have taken||besides Him||besides Him||gods||not||they create||anything||while they||are created||and not||they possess||for themselves||any harm||and not||any benefit||and not||they control||death||and not||life||and not||resurrection

translations.text: Wattakhazoo min dooniheee aalihatal laa yakhluqoona shai'anw Wa-hum yukhlaqoona Wa-laa yamlikoona li-anfusihim darranw Wa-laa naf'anw Wa-laa yamlikoona mawtanw Wa-laa hayaatanw Wa-laa nushooraa

words.id: dan berkata||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||ini||tidak lain||kecuali/hanyalah||kebohongan||(Muhammad) ada-adakannya||dan membantunya/menolongnya||atasnya/kepadanya||kaum||yang lain||maka sesungguhnya||mereka datang/berbuat||kezaliman||dan dusta
words.en: And say||those who||disbelieve||Not||this||(is) but||a lie||he invented it||and helped him||at it||people||other||But verily||they (have) produced||an injustice||and a lie

translations.text: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafarooo in haazaaa illaaa ifkunif taraahu Wa-a'aanahoo alaihi qawmun aakharoona faqad jaaa'oo zulmanw Wa-zooraa

words.id: dan mereka berkata||dongeng-dongeng||orang-orang terdahulu||dituliskannya||maka ia||dibacakan||atasnya||diwaktu pagi||dan petang
words.en: And they say||Tales||(of) the former people||which he has had written||and they||are dictated||to him||morning||and evening

translations.text: Wa-qaalooo asaateerul awwaleenak tatabahaa fahiya tumlaa alaihi bukratanw Wa-aseelaa

words.id: katakanlah||menurunkannya||yang||mengetahui||rahasia||pada||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||sesungguhnya Dia||adalah Dia||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: Say||Has sent it down||the One Who||knows||the secret||in||the heavens||and the earth||Indeed He||is||Oft-Forgiving||Most Merciful

translations.text: Qul anzalahul lazee ya'lamus sirra fis samaawaati wal-ard; innahoo kaana Ghafoorar Raheemaa

words.id: dan mereka berkata||mengapa||ini||Rasul||dia memakan||makanan||dan berjalan/berkeliaran||di/pada||pasar-pasar||mengapa tidak||diturunkan||kepadanya||seorang malaikat||lalu adalah dia||bersamanya||pemberi peringatan
words.en: And they say||Why does||this||Messenger||eat||[the] food||and walk||in||the markets||Why not||is sent down||to him||an Angel||then he be||with him||a warner

translations.text: Wa-qaaloo maa-li haazar Rasooli ya'kulut ta'aama Wa-yamshee fil aswaaq; law-laaa unzila ilaihi malakun fa-yakoona ma'ahoo nazeeraa

words.id: atau||dicampakkan/diberikan||kepadanya||perbendaharaan||atau||adalah||baginya||kebun||dia memakan||daripadanya||dan berkata||orang-orang yang zalim||tidak lain||kamu mengikuti||hanyalah||seorang laki-laki||kena sihir
words.en: Or||is delivered||to him||a treasure||or||is||for him||a garden||he may eat||from it||And say||the wrongdoers||Not||you follow||but||a man||bewitched

translations.text: Aw yulqaaa ilaihi kanzun aw takoonu lahoo jannatuien ya'kulu minhaa; Wa-qaalaz zaalimoona in tattabi'oona illaa rajulan mas-hooraa

words.id: perhatikanlah||bagaimana||mereka membuat||padamu/tentang kamu||perumpamaan||maka sesatlah mereka||maka tidak||mereka berkuasa/mampu||jalan
words.en: See||how||they set forth||for you||the similitudes||but they have gone astray||so not||they are able (to find)||a way

translations.text: Unzur kaifa daraboo lakal amsaala fadalloo falaa yastatee'oona sabeelaa

words.id: Maha Berkah/Maha Suci||(Allah) yang||jika||Dia menghendaki||Dia menjadikan||bagimu||lebih baik||dari||yang demikian||kebun-kebun||mengalir||dari||bawahnya||sungai-sungai||dan Dia menjadikan||untukmu||istana-istana
words.en: Blessed is He||Who||if||He willed||(could have) made||for you||better||than||that||gardens||flow||from||underneath it||the rivers||and He (could) make||for you||palaces

translations.text: Tabaarakal lazeee in shaaa'a ja'ala laka khairan min zaalika jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru Wa-yaj'al laka qusooraa

words.id: bahkan/tetapi||mereka mendustakan||dengan hari kiamat||dan Kami sediakan||bagi orang||ia mendustakan||dengan hari kiamat||neraka yang menyala-nyala
words.en: Nay||they deny||the Hour||and We have prepared||for (those) who||deny||the Hour||a Blazing Fire

translations.text: Bal kazzaboo bis-Saa'ati Wa-a'tadnaa liman kazzaba bis-Saa'ati sa'eeraa

words.id: apabila||(neraka) melihat mereka||dari||tempat||yang jauh||mereka akan mendengar||padanya||suara kemarahan||dan teriakan/suara bernyala-nyala
words.en: When||it sees them||from||a place||far||they will hear||its||raging||and roaring

translations.text: izaa ra'at-hum min makaanin ba'eedin sami'oo lahaa taghaiyuzanw Wa-zafeeraa

words.id: dan apabila||mereka dilemparkan||dari padanya/didalamnya||tempat||sempit||mereka dibelenggu||mereka berseru/mengharapkan||disana||kebinasaan
words.en: And when||they are thrown||thereof||(in) a place||narrow||bound in chains||they will call||there||(for) destruction

translations.text: Wa-izaaa ulqoo minhaa makaanan daiyyiqam muqar-raneena da'aw hunaalika thuboora

words.id: jangan||kamu mengharapkan||hari ini||kebinasaan||satu/sekali||dan harapkanlah||kebinasaan||yang banyak
words.en: (Do) not||call||this day||(for) destruction||one||but call||(for) destructions||many

translations.text: Laa tad'ul yawma thubooranw waahidanw wad'oo thubooran kaseeraa

words.id: katakanlah||apakah yang demikian itu||lebih baik||atau||surga||kekal||yang||dijanjikan||orang-orang dan bertakwa||adalah||bagi mereka||balasan||dan tempat kembali
words.en: Say||Is that||better||or||Garden||(of) Eternity||which||is promised||(to) the righteous||It will be||for them||a reward||and destination

translations.text: Qul azaalika khairun am Jannatul khuldil latee wu'idal muttaqoon; kaanat lahum jazaaa'anw Wa-maseeraa

words.id: bagi mereka||di dalamnya||apa yang||mereka kehendaki||mereka kekal||adalah||atas||Tuhanmu||janji||ditanya/dimohonkan
words.en: For them||therein||(is) whatever||they wish||they will abide forever||It is||on||your Lord||a promise||requested

translations.text: Lahum feehaa maa yashaaa'oona khaalideen; kaana 'alaa Rabbika wa'dan mas'oolaa

words.id: dan pada hari||(Allah) mengumpulkan mereka||dan apa-apa||mereka menyembah||dari||selain||Allah||maka (Allah) berkata||apakah kamu||kamu menyesatkan||hamba-hamba-Ku||mereka itu||atau||mereka||mereka sesat||jalan
words.en: And (the) Day||He will gather them||and what||they worship||besides Allah||besides Allah||besides Allah||and He will say||Did you||[you] mislead||My slaves||these||or||they||went astray||(from) the way

translations.text: Wa-Yawma yahshuruhum Wa-maa ya'budoona min doonil laahi fa-yaqoolu 'a-antum adlaltum ibaadee haaa'ulaaa'i am hum dallus sabeel

words.id: mereka berkata||Maha Suci Engkau||tidak||ada||patut||bagi kami||bahwa||kami mengambil/menjadikan||dari||selain Engkau||dari||pelindung||tetapi||Engkau memberi kenikmatan hidup mereka||dan bapak-bapak mereka||sehingga||mereka lupa||peringatan/mengingat||dan adalah mereka||kaum||binasa
words.en: They say||Glory be to You||Not||it was proper||it was proper||for us||that||we take||besides You||besides You||any||protectors||But||You gave them comforts||and their forefathers||until||they forgot||the Message||and became||a people||ruined

translations.text: Qaaloo Subhaanaka maa kaana yanbaghee lanaaa an nattakhiza min doonika min awliyaaa'a Wa-laakin matta'tahum Wa-aabaaa'ahum hattaa nasooz zikra Wa-kaanoo qawman booraa

words.id: maka sesungguhnya||mereka telah mendustakan kamu||dengan/tentang apa||mereka katakan||maka tidak||kamu kuasa/mampu/dapat||menolak||dan tidak||menolong||dan barangsiapa||ia berbuat zalim||diantara kamu||Kami rasakan kepadanya||azab||yang besar
words.en: So verily||they deny you||in what||you say||so not||you are able||(to) avert||and not||(to) help||And whoever||does wrong||among you||We will make him taste||a punishment||great

translations.text: Faqad kazzabookum bimaa taqooloona famaa tastatee'oona sarfanw Wa-laa nasraa; Wa-many yazlim minkum nuziqhu 'azaaban kabeeraa

words.id: dan Kami||tidak mengutus||sebelummu||dari||Rasul-rasul||kecuali||sesungguhnya mereka||sungguh mereka memakan||makanan||dan mereka berjalan||di||pasar-pasar||dan Kami jadikan||sebagian kamu||bagi sebagian yang lain||fitnah/cobaan||apakah/maukah kamu bersabar||dan adalah||Tuhanmu||Maha Melihat
words.en: And not||We sent||before you||any||Messengers||but||indeed they||[surely] ate||food||and walked||in||the markets||And We have made||some of you||for others||a trial||will you have patience||And is||your Lord||All-Seer

translations.text: Wa-maaa arsalnaa qablaka minal mursaleena illaaa innahum la-ya'kuloonat ta'aama Wa-yamshoona fil aswaaq; Wa-ja'alnaa ba'dakum liba'din fitnatan atasbiroon; Wa-kaana Rabbuka Baseera

words.id: dan berkata||orang-orang yang||(mereka) tidak||mengharapkan||pertemuan dengan Kami||mengapa tidak||diturunkan||atas/kepada kita||malaikat||atau||kita melihat||Tuhan kita||sesungguhnya||mereka sombong||dalam||diri mereka||dan mereka melampaui batas||kelewat batas||besar
words.en: And said||those who||(do) not||expect||(the) meeting with Us||Why not||are sent down||to us||the Angels||or||we see||our Lord||Indeed||they have become arrogant||within||themselves||and (become) insolent||(with) insolence||great

translations.text: Wa-qaalal lazeena laa yarjoona liqaaa'anaa law-laaa unzila alainal malaaa'ikatu aw naraa Rabbanaa; laqadis takbaroo feee anfusihim Wa-'ataw 'utuwwan kabeeraa

words.id: pada hari||mereka melihat||malaikat||tidak ada||kabar gembira||pada hari itu||bagi orang-orang yang berdosa||dan mereka berkata||larangan/halangan||terhalang
words.en: (The) Day||they see||the Angels||no||glad tidings||(will be) that Day||for the criminals||and they will say||A partition||forbidden

translations.text: Yawma yarawnal malaaa-'ikata laa bushraa Yawmaizin lil-mujrimeena Wa-yaqooloona hijran mahjooraa

words.id: dan Kami hadapi||kepada||apa||mereka kerjakan/amalkan||dari||amal-amal||lalu Kami jadikannya||debu||beterbangan
words.en: And We will proceed||to||whatever||they did||of||(the) deed(s)||and We will make them||(as) dust||dispersed

translations.text: Waqadimnaaa ilaa maa amiloo min amalin faja'alnaahu habaaa'an manthooraa

words.id: penghuni||surga||pada hari itu||lebih baik||tempat menetap/tinggal||dan lebih baik/indah||tempat istirahat
words.en: (The) companions||(of) Paradise||that Day||(will be in) a better||abode||and a better||resting-place

translations.text: As-haabul jannati yawma'izin khairun mustaqar-ranw Wa-ahsanu maqeela

words.id: dan pada hari itu||pecah belah||langit||dengan awan/kabut||dan diturunkan||malaikat||sebenar-benar turun
words.en: And (the) Day||will split open||the heavens||with the clouds||and (will be) sent down||the Angels||descending

translations.text: Wa-Yawma tashaqqaqus samaaa'u bilghamaami Wa-nuzzilal malaaa'ikatu tanzeela

words.id: kerajaan||pada hari itu||hak/benar||kepunyaan Yang Maha Pengasih||dan adalah||hari||atas||orang-orang kafir||kesulitan/kesukaran
words.en: The Sovereignty||that Day||(will be) truly||for the Most Gracious||And (it will) be||a Day||for||the disbelievers||difficult

translations.text: Almulku Yawma'izinil haqqu lir-Rahmaan; Wa-kaana Yawman 'alal kaafireena 'aseeraa

words.id: dan pada hari||menggigit||orang yang zalim||atas||dua tangannya||ia berkata||kiranya dulu||aku mengambil||bersama||Rasul||jalan
words.en: And (the) Day||will bite||the wrongdoer||[on]||his hands||he will say||O I wish!||I had taken||with||the Messenger||a way

translations.text: Wa-Yawma ya'adduz zaalimu 'alaa yadaihi yaqoolu yaa-laitanit takhaztu ma'ar Rasooli sabeelaa

words.id: aduh celakalah aku||kiranya aku||aku tidak||mengambil/menjadikan||si fulan||teman akrab
words.en: O woe to me!||I wish||not||I had taken||that one||(as) a friend

translations.text: Yaa-wailataa laitanee lam attakhiz fulaanan khaleelaa

words.id: sesungguhnya||ia telah menyesatkan aku||dari||peringatan||sesudah||ketika||dia datang kepadaku||dan adalah||syaitan||bagi manusia||tidak menolong/penyesat
words.en: Verily||he led me astray||from||the Reminder||after||[when]||it (had) come to me||And is||the Shaitaan||to the man||a deserter

translations.text: Laqad adallanee aniz zikri ba'da iz jaaa'anee; Wa-kaanash Shaitaanu lil-insaani khazoolaa

words.id: dan berkata||Rasul||Ya tuhanku||sesungguhnya||kaumku||mereka mengambil/menjadikan||ini||Al Qur'an||menjauhi/tidak dipedulikan
words.en: And said||the Messenger||O my Lord!||Indeed||my people||took||this||the Quran||(as) a forsaken thing

translations.text: Wa-qaalar Rasoolu yaa-Rabbi inna qawmit takhazoo haazal Qur'aana mahjooraa

words.id: dan seperti demikianlah||Kami telah menjadikan||bagi tiap-tiap||Nabi||musuh||dari||orang-orang yang berdosa||dan cukuplah||dengan Tuhanmu||petunjuk/pemimpin||dan penolong
words.en: And thus||We have made||for every||Prophet||an enemy||among||the criminals||But sufficient is||your Lord||(as) a Guide||and a Helper

translations.text: Wa-kazaalika ja'alnaa likulli Nabiyyin 'aduwwan minal mujrimeen; Wa-kafaa bi-Rabbika haadiyanw Wa-naseeraa

words.id: dan berkata||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||mengapa tidak||diturunkan||atasnya/kepadanya||Al-Qur'an||jumlah||satu/sekaligus||demikianlah||karena Kami hendak meneguhkan||dengannya||hatimu||dan Kami membacakannya||bacaan yang baik
words.en: And said||those who||disbelieve||Why not||was revealed||to him||the Quran||all at once||all at once||Thus||that We may strengthen||thereby||your heart||and We have recited it||(with distinct) recitation

translations.text: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo law-laa nuzzila alaihil Qur'aanu jumlatanw waahidah; kazaalika linusabbita bihee fu'aadaka Wa-rattalnaahu tarteelaa

words.id: dan mereka||tidak datang kepadamu||dengan suatu perumpamaan||melainkan||Kami datang kepadamu||dengan kebenaran||dan sebaik-baik||penjelasan
words.en: And not||they come to you||with an example||but||We bring you||the truth||and (the) best||explanation

translations.text: Wa-laa ya'toonaka bi-masalin illaa ji'naaka bilhaqqi Wa-ahsana tafseeraa

words.id: orang-orang yang||(mereka) dikumpulkan||atas||muka-muka mereka||ke||neraka Jahannam||mereka itu||paling jelek||tempat||dan paling sesat||jalan
words.en: Those who||will be gathered||on||their faces||to||Hell||those||(are the) worst||(in) position||and most astray||(from the) way

translations.text: Allazeena yuhsharoona 'alaa wujoohihim ilaa jahannama ulaaa'ika sharrun makaananw Wa-adallu sabeelaa

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||Kami telah memberikan||Musa||Al Kitab||dan Kami telah menjadikan||bersama/dia||saudaranya||Harun||pembantu
words.en: And verily||We gave||Musa||the Scripture||and We appointed||with him||his brother||Harun||(as) an assistant

translations.text: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba Wa-ja'alnaa ma'ahooo akhaahu Haaroona wazeeraa

words.id: maka Kami berfirman||pergilah kamu berdua||kepada||kaum||orang-orang yang||(mereka) dustakan||dengan ayat-ayat Kami||lalu Kami binasakan mereka||sebenar-benar binasa
words.en: Then We said||Go both of you||to||the people||those who||have denied||Our Signs||Then We destroyed them||(with) destruction

translations.text: Faqulnaz habaaa ilal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa fadammarnaahum tadmeeraa

words.id: dan kaum||Nuh||tatkala||mereka mendustakan||rasul-rasul||Kami tenggelamkan mereka||dan Kami jadikan mereka||bagi manusia||ayat/pelajaran||dan Kami telah menyediakan||bagi orang-orang yang zalim||azab||pedih
words.en: And (the) people||(of) Nuh||when||they denied||the Messengers||We drowned them||and We made them||for mankind||a sign||And We have prepared||for the wrongdoers||a punishment||painful

translations.text: Wa-qawma Noohin lammaa kazzabur Rusula aghraqnaahum Wa-ja'alnaahum linnaasi Aayatanw Wa-a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena 'azaaban aleemaa

words.id: dan kaum 'Ad||dan Tsamud||dan penduduk||Rass||dan kurun-kurun||diantara||demikian (kaum-kaum)||banyak
words.en: And Ad||and Thamud||and (the) dwellers||(of) Ar-rass||and generations||between||that||many

translations.text: Wa-'Aadanw Wa-Samooda Wa-As-haabar Rassi Wa-quroonan baina zaalika katheeraa

words.id: dan masing-masing||Kami telah menjadikan||baginya||tamsil||dan makanlah||Kami telah membinasakan||sebenar-benar binasa
words.en: And each||We have set forth||for him||the examples||and each||We destroyed||(with) destruction

translations.text: Wa-kullan darabnaa lahul amsaala Wa-kullan tabbarnaa tatbeera

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||mereka telah melalui||atas||suatu negeri||yang||dihujani||hujan||sangat buruk||apakah maka tidak||adalah||mereka melihatnya||bahkan||adalah mereka||tidak||mereka mengharapkan||kebangkitan
words.en: And verily||they have come||upon||the town||which||was showered||(with) a rain||(of) evil||Then do not||they [were]||see it||Nay||they are||not||expecting||Resurrection

translations.text: Wa-laqad ataw 'alal qaryatil lateee umtirat mataras saw'; afalam yakoonoo yarawnahaa; bal kaanoo laa yarjoona nushooraa

words.id: dan apabila||mereka melihat kamu||tidaklah||mereka menjadikan kami||melainkan||ejekan||inikah||yang||mengutus||Allah||Rasul
words.en: And when||they see you||not||they take you||except||(in) mockery||Is this||the one whom||Allah has sent||Allah has sent||(as) a Messenger

translations.text: Wa-izaa ra-awka ien yattakhizoonaka illaa huzuwan ahaazal lazee ba'asal laahu Rasoolaa

words.id: sesungguhnya||hampir||sungguh ia menyesatkan kita||dari||tuhan/sesembahan kita||seandainya tidak||bahwa||kita bersabar||atasnya/kepadanya||dan kelak||mereka akan mengetahui||ketika||mereka melihat||azab||siapa||lebih sesat||jalan
words.en: He would have almost||He would have almost||[surely] misled us||from||our gods||if not||that||we had been steadfast||to them||And soon||will know||when||they will see||the punishment||who||(is) more astray||(from the) way

translations.text: in kaada la-yudillunaa 'an aalihatinaa law-laaa an sabarnaa alaihaa; Wa-sawfa ya'lamoona heena yarawnal 'azaaba man adallu sabeela

words.id: tidakkah kamu perhatikan||orang||mengambil/menjadikan||Tuhannya||hawa nafsunya||apakah maka kamu||kamu adalah/menjadi||atasnya||penjaga/pemelihara
words.en: Have you seen||(one) who||takes||(as) his god||his own desire||Then would you||be||over him||a guardian

translations.text: Ara'aita manit takhaza ilaahahoo hawaahu afa-anta takoonu alaihi wakeelaa

words.id: atau||kamu mengira||bahwa||kebanyakan mereka||mereka mendengar||atau||mereka berakal/memahami||tidak lain||mereka||kecuali||seperti binatang ternak||bahkan||mereka||lebih sesat||jalan
words.en: Or||do you think||that||most of them||hear||or||understand||Not||they||(are) except||like cattle||Nay||they||(are) more astray||(from the) way

translations.text: Am tahsabu anna aksarahum yasma'oona aw ya'qiloon; in hum illaa kal-an'aami bal hum adallu sabeelaa

words.id: tidakkah||kamu perhatikan||kepada||Tuhanmu||bagaimana||Dia memanjangkan||bayang-bayang||dan jika||Dia menghendaki||niscaya dia menjadikannya||tetap diam||kemudian||Kami jadikan||matahari||atasnya||bukti/petunjuk
words.en: Do you not||see||[to]||your Lord||how||He extends||the shadow||And if||He willed||surely He (could) have made it||stationary||Then||We made||the sun||for it||an indication

translations.text: Alam tara ilaa Rabbika kaifa maddaz zilla Wa-law shaaa'a la-ja'alahoo saakinan thumma ja'alnash shamsa alaihi daleelaa

words.id: kemudian||Kami menggenggam/menariknya||kepada Kami||genggaman/tarikan||mudah/perlahan
words.en: Then||We withdraw it||to Us||a withdrawal||gradual

translations.text: Thumma qabadnaahu ilainaa qabdany yaseeraa

words.id: dan Dia||yang||telah menjadikan||bagi kalian||malam||pakaian||dan tidur||istirahat||dan Dia menjadikan||siang||bangkit/bangun
words.en: And He||(is) the One Who||made||for you||the night||(as) a covering||and the sleep||a rest||and made||the day||a resurrection

translations.text: Wa-Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul laila libaasanw wannawma subaatanw Wa-ja'alan nahaara nushooraa

words.id: dan Dia||yang||mengirimkan/meniupkan||angin||kabar gembira||antara||hadapan||rahmat-Nya||dan Kami turunkan||dari||langit||air||bersih/suci
words.en: And He||(is) the One Who||sends||the winds||(as) glad tidings||before||before||His Mercy||and We send down||from||the sky||water||pure

translations.text: Wa-Huwal lazeee arsalar riyaaha bushran baina yadai rahmatih; Wa-anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an tahooraa

words.id: untuk Kami hidupkan||dengannya (air itu)||negeri (tanah)||yang mati||dan Kami beri minum dengannya||dari apa||Kami telah ciptakan||binatang ternak||dan manusia||banyak
words.en: That We may give life||thereby||(to) a land||dead||and We give drink||thereof||(to those) We created||cattle||and men||many

translations.text: Linuhyiya bihee baldatan maitanw wa-nusqiyahoo mimmaa khalaqnaaa an'aamanw Wa-anaasiyya katheeraa

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||Kami telah mempergilirkannya||diantara mereka||agar mereka mengambil pelajaran||maka/tetapi enggan||kebanyakan||manusia||kecuali||ingkar
words.en: And verily||We have distributed it||among them||that they may remember||but refuse||most||(of) the people||except||disbelief

translations.text: Wa-laqad sarrafnaahu bainahum li-yazzakkaroo fa-abaaa aksarun naasi illaa kufooraa

words.id: dan jika||Kami menghendaki||niscaya Kami utus||pada||tiap-tiap||negeri||seorang pemberi peringatan
words.en: And if||We willed||surely We (would) have raised||in||every||town||a warner

translations.text: Wa-law shi'naa laba'asnaa fee kulli qaryatin nazeeraa

words.id: maka janganlah||kamu patuh||orang-orang kafir||dan berjihadlah terhadap mereka||dengannya||jihad||yang besar
words.en: So (do) not||obey||the disbelievers||and strive (against) them||with it||a striving||great

translations.text: Falaa tuti'il kaafireena Wa-jaahidhum bihee jihaadan kabeeraa

words.id: dan Dia||yang||membiarkan||dua laut||ini||tawar||segar||dan ini||asin||pahit||dan Dia menjadikan||antara keduanya||dinding||dan batas||membatasi/menghalangi
words.en: And He||(is) the One Who||(has) released||the two seas||[this] (one)||palatable||and sweet||and [this] (one)||salty||(and) bitter||and He has made||between them||a barrier||and a partition||forbidden

translations.text: Wa-Huwal lazee marajal bahraini haazaa 'azbun furaatunw Wa-haazaa milhun ujaaj; Wa-ja'ala bainahumaa barzakhanw Wa-hijran mahjooraa

words.id: dan Dia||yang||menciptakan||dari||air||manusia||lalu Dia jadikannya||keturunan||dan hubungan perkawinan||dan adalah||Tuhanmu||Maha Kuasa
words.en: And He||(is) the One Who||has created||from||the water||human being||and has made (for) him||blood relationship||and marriage relationship||And is||your Lord||All-Powerful

translations.text: Wa-Huwal lazee khalaqa minal maaa'i basharan fa-ja'alahoo nasaban Wa-sihraa; Wa-kaana Rabbuka Qadeeraa

words.id: dan mereka menyembah||dari||selain||Allah||apa yang||tidak||memberi manfaat kepada mereka||dan tidak||memberi mudarat kepada mereka||dan adalah||orang kafir||atas||Tuhannya||bantuan/pembantu
words.en: But they worship||besides Allah||besides Allah||besides Allah||what||not profits them||not profits them||and not||harms them||and is||the disbeliever||against||his Lord||a helper

translations.text: Wa-ya'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yanfa'uhum Wa-laa yadurruhum; Wa-kaanal kaafiru 'alaa Rabbihee zaheeraa

words.id: dan tidak||Kami mengutus kamu||melainkan||pembawa kabar gembira||dan pemberi peringatan
words.en: And not||We sent you||except||(as) a bearer of glad tidings||and a warner

translations.text: Wa-maa arsalnaaka illaa mubashshiranw Wa-nazeeraa

words.id: katakanlah||tidak||aku minta kepadamu||atasnya||dari||upah||melainkan||orang||menghendaki||bahwa||ia mengambil||kepada||Tuhannya||jalan
words.en: Say||Not||I ask (of) you||for it||any||payment||except||(that) whoever wills||(that) whoever wills||to||take||to||his Lord||a way

translations.text: Qul maaa as'alukum alaihi min ajrin illaa man shaaa'a ai yattakhiza ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa

words.id: dan bertawakallah||atas/kepada||Yang Hidup||yang||tidak||mati||dan bertasbih||dengan memuji-Nya||dan cukup-lah||dengan-Nya/Dia||dengan/terhadap dosa-dosa||hamba-hamba-Nya||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: And put your trust||in||the Ever-Living||the One Who||does not die||does not die||and glorify||with His Praise||And sufficient is||He||regarding the sins||(of) His slaves||All-Aware

translations.text: Wa-tawakkal 'alal Haiyil lazee laa yamootu Wa-sabbih bihamdih; Wa-kafaa bihee bizunoobi ibaadihee khabeeraa

words.id: Yang||menciptakan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dan apa||diantara keduanya||dalam||enam||hari/masa||kemudian||Dia menuju||di atas||Arsy'||Maha Pengasih||maka tanyakanlah||dengannya/tentang itu||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: The One Who||created||the heavens||and the earth||and whatever||(is) between them||in||six||periods||then||He established Himself||over||the Throne||the Most Gracious||so ask||Him||(as He is) All-Aware

translations.text: Allazee khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa fee sittati aiyaamin thumma stawaa 'alal 'Arsh; ar-Rahmaanu fas'al bihee khabeeraa

words.id: dan apabila||dikatakan||kepada mereka||bersujudlah kamu||kepada Yang Maha Pengasih||mereka berkata||dan siapakah||Maha Pengasih itu||apakah kami bersujud||kepada apa||kamu perintahkan kami||dan menambah mereka||lari jauh
words.en: And when||it is said||to them||Prostrate||to the Most Gracious||They say||And what||(is) the Most Gracious||Should we prostrate||to what||you order us||And it increases them||(in) aversion

translations.text: Wa-izaa qeela lahumus judoo lir-Rahmaani qaaloo Wa-mar Rahmaanu 'a-nasjudu limaa ta'murunaa Wa-zaadahum nufooraa

words.id: Maha Suci||yang||telah menjadikan||di||langit||gugusan bintang||Dan dia menjadikan||padanya||pelita (matahari)||dan bulan||bercahaya
words.en: Blessed is He||Who||has placed||in||the skies||constellations||and has placed||therein||a lamp||and a moon||shining

translations.text: Tabaarakal lazee ja'ala fis samaaa'i buroojanw Wa-ja'ala feehaa siraajanw Wa-qamaran muneeraa

words.id: dan Dia||yang||menjadikan||malam||dan siang||berlainan/silih berganti||bagi orang||hendak/ingin||bahwa||ia mengambil pelajaran||atau||ia hendak||bersyukur
words.en: And He||(is) the One Who||made||the night||and the day||(in) succession||for whoever||desires||to||remember||or||desires||to be thankful

translations.text: Wa-huwal lazee ja'alal laila wannahaara khilfatan liman araada 'any yazzakkara aw araadaa shukooraa

words.id: dan hamba-hamba||Maha Pengasih||orang-orang yang||(mereka) berjalan||di atas||bumi||rendah hati||dan apabila||mengajak omong-omong mereka||orang-orang jahil/bodoh||mereka berkata||keselamatan
words.en: And (the) slaves||(of) the Most Gracious||(are) those who||walk||on||the earth||(in) humbleness||and when||address them||the ignorant ones||they say||Peace

translations.text: Wa-'ibaadur Rahmaanil lazeena yamshoona 'alal ardi hawnanw Wa-izaa khaata-bahumul jaahiloona qaaloo salaamaa

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||(mereka) bermalam||kepada Tuhan mereka||bersujud||dan berdiri
words.en: And those who||spend (the) night||before their Lord||prostrating||and standing

translations.text: Wallazeena yabeetoona li-Rabbihim sujjadanw Wa-qiyaamaa

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||(mereka) berkata||ya Tuhan kami||palingkanlah/jauhkanlah||dari kami||azab||Jahannam||sesungguhnya||azabnya||adalah||kebinasaan yang kekal
words.en: And those who||say||Our Lord!||Avert||from us||the punishment||(of) Hell||Indeed||its punishment||is||inseparable

translations.text: Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanas rif 'annaa 'azaaba Jahannama inna 'azaabahaa kaana gharaamaa

words.id: sesungguhnya ia||sejelek-jelek||tempat menetap||dan tempat kediaman
words.en: Indeed it||(is) an evil||abode||and resting place

translations.text: innahaa saaa'at mustaqarranw Wa-muqaamaa

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||tatkala||mereka membelanjakan||mereka tidak||berlebih-lebihan||dan tidak||mereka kikir||dan adalah||antara||demikian||berdiri
words.en: And those who||when||they spend||(are) not extravagant||(are) not extravagant||and are not stingy||and are not stingy||but are||between||that||moderate

translations.text: Wallazeena izaaa anfaqoo lam yusrifoo Wa-lam yaqturoo Wa-kaana baina zaalika qawaamaa

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||(mereka) tidak||menyembah||beserta||Allah||Tuhan||lain||dan tidak||mereka membunuh||jiwa/seseorang||yang||mengharamkan||Allah||kecuali||dengan baik||dan tidak||mereka berzina||dan barangsiapa||berbuat||demikian||dia mendapat||dosa
words.en: And those who||(do) not||invoke||with||Allah||god||another||and (do) not||[they] kill||the soul||which||Allah has forbidden||Allah has forbidden||except||by right||and (do) not||commit adultery||And whoever||does||that||will meet||a penalty

translations.text: Wallazeena laa yad'oona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara Wa-laa yaqtuloonan nafsal latee harramal laahu illaa bilhaqqi Wa-laa yaznoon; Wa-mai yaf'al zaalika yalqa 'athaamaa

words.id: akan dilipatgandakan||untuknya||azab||hari||kiamat||dan dia kekal||didalamnya/dalam azab||terhina
words.en: Will be doubled||for him||the punishment||(on the) Day||(of) Resurrection||and he will abide forever||therein||humiliated

translations.text: Yudaa'af lahul 'azaabu Yawmal Qiyaamati Wa-yakhlud feehee muhaanaa

words.id: kecuali||orang||bertaubat||dan beriman||dan mengerjakan||pekerjaan/amal||kebajikan/saleh||maka mereka itu||akan mengganti||Allah||kejahatan-kejahatan mereka||kebaikan||dan adalah||Allah||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: Except||(he) who||repents||and believes||and does||righteous deeds||righteous deeds||then (for) those||Allah will replace||Allah will replace||their evil deeds||(with) good ones||And is||Allah||Oft-Forgiving||Most Merciful

translations.text: illaa man taaba Wa-'aamana Wa-'amila 'amalan saalihan fa-ulaaa'ika yubad-dilul laahu saiyyi-aatihim hasanaat; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa

words.id: dan barangsiapa||bertaubat||dan beramal||kebajikan/saleh||maka sesungguhnya dia||dia bertaubat||kepada||Allah||sebenar-benar taubat
words.en: And whoever||repents||and does||righteous (deeds)||then indeed he||turns||to||Allah||(with) repentance

translations.text: Wa-man taaba Wa-'amila saalihan fa-innahoo yatoobu ilal laahi mataabaa

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||(mereka) tidak||memberikan kesaksian||palsu||dan apabila||mereka melalui||dengan perkara sia-sia||mereka melalui||kemuliaan/kehormatan
words.en: And those who||(do) not||bear witness||(to) the falsehood||and when||they pass||by futility||they pass||(as) dignified ones

translations.text: Wallazeena laa yash-hadoonaz zoora Wa-izaa marroo billaghwi marroo kiraamaa

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||apabila||mereka diberi peringatan||dengan ayat-ayat||Tuhan mereka||tidak||mereka tunduk||atasnya/kepadanya||orang-orang tuli||dan orang-orang buta
words.en: And those who||when||they are reminded||of (the) Verses||(of) their Lord||(do) not||fall||upon them||deaf||and blind

translations.text: Wallazeena izaa zukkiroo bi-Aayaati Rabbihim lam yakhirroo alaihaa summanw wa'umyaanaa

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||(mereka) berkata||ya Tuhan kami||anugerahkan||bagi kami||dari||isteri-isteri kami||dan keturunan kami||penyejuk||mata||dan jadikanlah kami||bagi orang-orang yang bertakwa||pemuka/pemimpin
words.en: And those who||say||Our Lord!||Grant||to us||from||our spouses||and our offspring||comfort||(to) our eyes||and make us||for the righteous||a leader

translations.text: Wallazeena yaqooloona Rabbanaa hab lanaa min azwaajinaa Wa-zurriyaatinaa qurrata a'yuninw waj-'alnaa lilmuttaqeena imaamaa

words.id: mereka itu||akan diberi balasan||martabat yang tinggi||dengan apa/sebab||mereka bersabar||dan mereka akan disambut||didalamnya (surga)||penghormatan||dan ucapan selamat
words.en: Those||will be awarded||the Chamber||because||they were patient||and they will be met||therein||(with) greetings||and peace

translations.text: Ulaaa'ika yujzawnal ghurfata bimaa sabaroo Wa-yulaqqawna feehaa tahiyyatanw Wa-salaamaa

words.id: mereka kekal||didalamnya||sebaik-baik||tempat menetap||dan tempat tinggal
words.en: Will abide forever||in it||Good||(is) the settlement||and a resting place

translations.text: Khaalideena feehaa; hasunat mustaqarranw Wa-muqaamaa

words.id: katakanlah||tidak||memperdulikan||dengan/untuk kalian||Tuhanku||sekiranya tidak||seruanmu/ibadatmu||maka sesungguhnya||kamu telah dustakan||maka kelak||adalah||pasti
words.en: Say||Not||will care||for you||my Lord||if not||your prayer (is to Him)||But verily||you have denied||so soon||will be||the inevitable (punishment)

translations.text: Qul maa ya'ba'u bikum Rabbee law-laa du'aaa'ukum faqad kazzabtum fasawfa yakoonu lizaamaa
